author: Andy Pearson
method: Place the brown sugar and the lemon juice into a jug and stir to dissolve.  Place the lemon mixture and all the other ingredients into a large bowl and stir well.  Either serve the punch in the bowl or pour into the hollowed-out pumpkin. Add the lemon and lime pieces and serve.
ingredients: 10 tbsp dark brown sugar,  300ml/10½fl oz lemon juice,  300ml/10½fl oz white rum ,  300ml/10½fl oz gold rum ,  300ml/10½fl oz demerara rum (preferably 151 proof) ,  300ml/10½fl oz pineapple juice,  300ml/10½fl oz lime juice ,  300ml/10½fl oz passion fruit syrup ,  8-10 dashes bitters,  1 pineapple,  1 large pumpkin, top removed and flesh and seeds carved out and discarded, optional,  1 lemon, cut into eight pieces,  1 lime, cut into eight pieces
